Yii Framework v2.0.0-dev Class Reference

Class yii\base\ActionEvent

All Classes | Properties | Methods
Inheritanceyii\base\ActionEvent » yii\base\Event » yii\base\Object
Implementsyii\base\Arrayable
Available since version2.0
Source Code
ActionEvent represents the event parameter used for an action event.

By setting the $isValid property, one may control whether to continue running the action.

Public Properties

Hide inherited properties

PropertyTypeDescriptionDefined By
$name string The event name yii\base\Event
$sender object The sender of this event yii\base\Event
$handled boolean Whether the event is handled yii\base\Event
$data mixed The data that is passed to yii\base\Component::on() when attaching an event handler yii\base\Event
$action yii\base\Action The action currently being executed yii\base\ActionEvent
$result mixed The action result yii\base\ActionEvent
$isValid boolean Whether to continue running the action yii\base\ActionEvent

Property Details

$action property
yii\base\Action $action = null

The action currently being executed

$result property
mixed $result = null

The action result. Event handlers may modify this property to change the action result.

$isValid property
boolean $isValid = true

Whether to continue running the action. Event handlers of yii\base\Controller::EVENT_BEFORE_ACTION may set this property to decide whether to continue running the current action.

$action yii\base\Action The action associated with this action event.
$config array Name-value pairs that will be used to initialize the object properties
